sentence.Network_en: I suspected the existence of a dictaphone somewhere in his panelled rooms.
sentence.Network_cn: 我还疑心说不定在他装有镶板的什么地方,还会藏着一部口述留声机哩.

sentence.Network_en: I vainly tried to record it on my Dictaphone, at the match.
sentence.Network_cn: 观看比赛时,我徒劳地试图用录音电话把它记录下来.

sentence.Network_en: I was using a dictaphone to record the conversation.
sentence.Network_cn: 我用的是口述录音机来记录对话.

auth_sentence.content: Lo-fi meets hi-fi, as big drum thunder under-booms sometime dictaphone-style scratchiness in the vocal department.

auth_sentence.content: My husband even went off to Sedgefield races with a dictaphone and recorded messages from jockeys which were played to Peter.

auth_sentence.content: He slept with a Dictaphone near his bed, in case he woke up in the night with an insight that might give him an edge in court.
